actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress with respect to the United Nations position concerning the discharge by pressurized cans of fluorocarbon compounds into the atmosphere.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that the President, acting through the United States delegation to the United Nations, should encourage that organization to adopt a resolution calling for international cooperation in the scientific investigation of the discharge of flourocarbon compounds into the air.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress with respect to the United Nations position concerning the discharge by pressurized cans of fluorocarbon compounds into the atmosphere.
